description: Phryne is the daughter of a priest. She has sudden outbursts, like when she begs for http://anidb.net/ch22208 [Clain] to let her see his smile. She has gotten close to him and they spend a night in a lot of ancient ruins together. Phryne`s wish upon the day star was for "Clain`s smile to persist forever".
name: Phryne
